en.commandOnCooldownPremium: this command is still on cooldown for another %VAR% seconds
en.langsAvailable: here are the available language options:

en.helpUsageValue: you can also use `%VAR%help <command>` to get more information about a single command

en.serverInviteDescription: click [here](%VAR%) to join the support server

en.prefixDescription: set the prefix for this server

en.msgDmDescription: send a message to an id's dm
en.enchantifyDescription: turn text into minecraft enchantment table
en.randomcaseDescription: makes your text go LiKE tHiS, mHmMM vERy RaNDoM

wukong! is developed by lucas!#8336
he really likes bananas
